priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire SGRQ-C Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C106670

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire SGRQ-C Test Name Terminology

definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire for COPD Patients test name.
name: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire for COPD Patients Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire SGRQ-C Test Name Terminology
synonyms: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire for COPD Patients Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: I get afraid or panic when I cannot catch my breath.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Afraid or Panic When Cannot Catch Breath

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot do household chores.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Do Household Chores

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out for entertainment or recreation.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Go Out for Entertainment

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out of the house to do the shopping.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
synonyms: SGRQC1-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot move far from my bed or chair.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Move Far From Bed
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-Cannot Move Far From My Bed
synonyms: SGRQC1-Cannot Move Far From My Bed

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot play sports or do other physical activities.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Play Sports

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I cannot take a bath or shower, or I take a long time to do it.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Cannot Take a Bath or Shower
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-Cannot Take a Bath or Shower
synonyms: SGRQC1-Cannot Take a Bath or Shower

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: My cough or breathing is embarrassing in public.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Cough Is Embarrassing in Public

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: My coughing or breathing disturbs my sleep.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Coughing Disturbs My Sleep

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: Coughing hurts.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Coughing Hurts

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: Coughing makes me tired.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Coughing Makes Me Tired

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Please check one box to show how you describe your current health.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Description of Your Current Health

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How would you describe your respiratory problems?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Description of Your Respiratory Problems

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as carry heavy loads, dig in the garden or shovel snow, jog or walk briskly (5 miles per hour), play tennis or swim.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Difficult to Carry Heavy Loads

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as walk up hills, carry things up stairs, light gardening such as weeding, dance, bowl or play golf.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Difficult to Walk Up Hills

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: Everything seems too much of an effort.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Everything Seems Too Much Effort

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: Exercise is not safe for me.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
synonyms: SGRQC1-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: I have become frail or an invalid because of my respiratory problems.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Become Frail Because of Respiratory Problems

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: I get exhausted easily.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Get Exhausted Easily

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How many respiratory attacks did you have during the last year?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Number of Respiratory Attacks Last Year

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How often do you have good days (with few respiratory problems)?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Good Days with Few Respiratory Problems
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-How Often Do You Have Good Days
synonyms: SGRQC1-How Often Do You Have Good Days

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How do your respiratory problems affect you?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - How Respiratory Problems Affect You

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I bring up phlegm (sputum).
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Bring Up Phlegm

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I cough.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Cough

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I have attacks of wheezing.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Have Attacks of Wheezing

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I have shortness of breath.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Have Shortness of Breath

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: If I hurry or walk fast, I have to stop or slow down.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - If Walk Fast Have to Stop
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-If I Hurry, I Have to Stop
synonyms: SGRQC1-If I Hurry, I Have to Stop

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: Jobs such as household chores take a long time, or I have to stop to rest.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Jobs Take a Long Time

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: I feel that I am not in control of my respiratory problems.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Not in Control of Respiratory Problems
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-Not in Control of Resp Problems
synonyms: SGRQC1-Not in Control of Resp Problems

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: My respiratory problems are a nuisance to my family, friends or neighbours.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems a Nuisance to Family, Friends or Neighbours

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: I am short of breath when I bend over.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Short of Breath When Bend Over
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-Short of Breath When Bend Over
synonyms: SGRQC1-Short of Breath When Bend Over

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: I am short of breath when I talk.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Short of Breath When Talk

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I take a long time to get washed or dressed.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Take a Long Time to Get Washed or Dressed
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-Take a Long Time to Get Washed
synonyms: SGRQC1-Take a Long Time to Get Washed

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I walk slower than other people my age, or I stop to rest.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Walk Slower Than Other People My Age
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-Walk Slow Than Others My Age
synonyms: SGRQC1-Walk Slow Than Others My Age

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: If I walk up one flight of stairs, I have to go slowly or stop.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Walk Up Flight of Stairs Slowly
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-Walk Up Flight of Stairs Slowly
synonyms: SGRQC1-Walk Up Flight of Stairs Slowly

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking around the house.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Around the House

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking outside on level ground.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Outside on Level Ground

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking up hills.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Up Hills

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking up a flight of stairs.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Up a Flight of Stairs
terms.submissionValue: SGRQC1-Walking Up a Flight of Stairs
synonyms: SGRQC1-Walking Up a Flight of Stairs

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Washing or dressing yourself.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Washing or Dressing Yourself

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - If you wheeze, is it worse when you get up in the morning?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ-C - Wheezing Worse In the Morning
